title: 08: S6E08 – "Abide the Signs" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you four terrifying tales from authors Christopher Maxim, Irving Crane, Kyle Harrison, and Hugh Lu, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about ruinous rituals, diabolical disabilities, residual repercussions, and small-town terrors.  

                                     
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
